code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import userReducer from"../features/user/userSlice";import productReducer from"../features/product/productSlice";import cartReducer from"../features/cart/cartSlice";import orderReducer from"../features/order/orderSlice";var rootReducer={user:userReducer,product:productReducer,cart:cartReducer,order:orderReducer};var store=configureStore({reducer:rootReducer});export default store;
